casebody.data:
JONES
v.
DAVIS. No. 232A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 21, 2004. Urs R. Gsteiger, Elizabeth Horton, Howard C. Jones, II, Winston-Salem, for Jones, Southard, Bowers and Sammons. Fred Folger, Jr., Edwin M. Woltz, Mount Airy, for Surry County.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of June 2004 by Defendants to Extend Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Davis and Allred) shall have up to and including the 13th day of August 2004 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of June 2004."
